entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Blackhole #104877
  • Exception when using LibGit2Sharp with .NET 9 preview 6 #104872
  • Add a type static class at the CLR level #104869
  • spmi collect on crossgen2 windows x86 failes with "No input files are loadable" #104863
    Future

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT/opt/ObjectStackAllocation/ObjectStackAllocationTests/ObjectStackAllocationTests.cmd #104337
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable object stack allocation #104350
    9.0.0
  • Recurisve intrinsics aren't expanded in T0 anymore #104871
  • System.Numerics.Tensors 9.0.0-preview.6.24327.7 breaks UnaryOperators invoking InvokeSpanSpanIntoSpan #104866

PullRequests

Created

  • [GC] Fix freelist crash - don't modify during check-only operation #104876
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add support for folding core SIMD operations that produce TYP_MASK on newer hardware #104875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid duplicate hash table lookups in VN #104873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark some structs as byreflike #104870
    needs-area-label
  • Convert Perl scripts to C# in coreclr #104867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use Utf8.IsValid to optimize ManagedWebSocket.TryValidateUtf8 #104865
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expand IsReferenceOrContainsReferences in T0 #104874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add fedora in install script #104860
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Replace some read-only use of Span with ReadOnlySpan #104864
    area-Meta
  • Don't attempt to `EnsureInitializedToManagedFrame` under `USE_PORTABLE_HELPERS` #104868
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add a buffer to `FileWriter` and add a `--parallelism` option to superpmi.py #104789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Fix Socket_UDS_Success_ActivityRecorded test #104862
    area-System.Net.Sockets

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2494717 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • SPMI: Fix a few memory leaks #104691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • illumos: set default timezone info path #104533
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Issue 104700: Clarify error message for collection property with no getter #104861
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Avoid buffer copying in JSON number equality comparison #104850
    area-System.Text.Json
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix superpmi collect failure for crossgen2 on linux x64 and windows x86 #104181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question]: why is c++ 11 not installed in the root fs on the linux distros? #2623

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Jul 10 #2632

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `dotnet watch` silently fails when `launchSettings.json` contains comments #35558

Updated

  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • .NET 8: Enable private NuGet dependencies for alternative licensing #26286

PullRequests

Created

  • Set targetOS properly for HostModel #42144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update SB CI to alpine 3.20 #42119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ref` modifier keyword is missing from completions for `ref struct` primary constructor parameter definition #74386
  • Reference highlight doesn't highlight references/usages of type aliases #74384
  • Parameter info/signature help session won't start #74383

Closed

  • Wrong type with Concat and litteral collection [] #74309
  • implicit `return 0` for <top-level-statements-entry-point> #74385

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Overload Resolution Priority from working set #74382
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: updates #56782
  • Perf improvement: json #56781
  • [Blazor] [Documentation] Example project referenced in the documentation doesn't work #56779
  • WasmStripILAfterAOT Error #56783
  • Missing binary in ARM64 Debian Bookworm repository #56778

Closed

  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.StaticWebAssets.targets unable to publish when static web assets been removed after build phase #56755
  • Windows Server Hosting Bundle does not remove previous installation during upgrade #55950
    9.0-preview7
  • Blazor Streamrendering not working for the example weather app #56509
  • Future of standalone WASM applications #56761
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, https #56751

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HideSoftInputOnTapped incorrect behavior on Editor #23603

Closed

  • Instructions for building Maui Project with Pair to Mac do not work. Can Pair but cannot build to Simulator. #23605
  • Publishing with uiAccess #23601

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Honor IconImageSource.FontImageSource color #23604
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, area-fonts, community ✨

Updated

  • Android pan fixes #21547
    community ✨, area-gestures
  • Make ampersands work *more* in net9-only blazor-solution template #23589
    area-blazor, area-templates
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Created

  • Make many to many relationship on same domain model #34224
